code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @return {Integer}
def minimum_seconds(nums)
  return 0 if nums.uniq.length <= 1

  max_streak = current_streak = 1
  n = nums.length
  nums.each_with_index do |num, i|
    next_num = nums[(i + 1) % n]
    if num == next_num
      current_streak += 1
      max_streak = [max_streak, current_streak].max
    else
      current_streak = 1
    end
  end

  # Check for circular streak
  if nums[0] == nums[-1]
    i = 0
    while nums[i] == nums[-1]
      current_streak += 1
      i += 1
    end
    max_streak = [max_streak, current_streak].max
  end

  (Math.log(n.to_f / max_streak, 2) + 1).ceil
end
